name: C:\PROTEIN_SYNTHESIS
description:
You are the new operator of the PROTEIN_SYNTHESIS Operation,  located in Nucleus™. Your job is to make sure the mRNA bases are matched with the correct DNA bases. Perfection is expected, one single mistake could completely disrupt the entire operation. No pressure.

This game was made for Mrs. Bolmer's Biology Honors class for a project on protein synthesis.

______________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY:

Drag the mRNA bases to the corresponding DNA bases.

A <- U

T <- A

G <- C

C <- G

NOTE:

Bases are specific to their match, including duplicates. If a match doesn't work, try it with the other match.

Best if played in fullscreen mode.

______________________________________________________

Special thanks to Mrs. Bolmer for her continuous support and patience with this project. Making games is very important to me and I greatly appreciate this opportunity.

______________________________________________________
